scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_ASSET_PREFIX=https://celesia.app npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.build:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:debug && wrangler pages deploy frontend/out --project-name=invitation-maker
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy frontend/out --project-name=invitation-maker-production
scripts.build:preview: cross-env NODE_ENV=preview NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=https://invitation-maker-api.celesia91.workers.dev/api NEXT_PUBLIC_ASSET_PREFIX=https://preview.invitation-maker.pages.dev npm --prefix frontend run build
